job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and potentially integrating new functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to participating in 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', which is a core task in model development and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies aligns with the experimental and development aspects of AI model work.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system to enhance its functionality, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating a pragmatic approach to overcoming challenges.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI models through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's an element of AI model improvement (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on applying and integrating these AI capabilities into a broader support function and improving the system where AI falls short (1.A.1). The role is not about developing novel AI models from scratch or deep research, but rather about making AI work better within an existing operational framework. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. The tasks are specific enough to categorize, although the 'AI model fine-tuning' aspect could lean slightly towards a specialist role, the overall framing points to integration. The salary and title suggest a more operational/support role rather than a pure AI/ML engineering role.
